name: Dungeon Defenders II
description: Dungeon Defenders II is a cooperative Action Tower Defense game packed with roleplaying elements like loot, leveling, and pets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (SP1) 64-Bit Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play. Integrated graphics chips are not recommended.
